subject: World Cup (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Spaniards have been the kings of soccer over the last half-dozen years, winning the last World Cup and the last two European championships, but they have arrived in Brazil relatively unnoticed.
snippet: The Spaniards have been the kings of soccer over the last half-dozen years, winning the last World Cup and the last two European championships, but they have arrived in Brazil relatively unnoticed.
